51#ifndef AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_H
52#define AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_H
53
54#ifdef __cplusplus
55extern "C"
56{
57#endif
58#include "am_mcu_apollo.h"
59
60/* Page Control Register */
61#define TAS2560_PAGECTL_REG 0
62
63/* Book Control Register (available in page0 of each book) */
64#define TAS2560_BOOKCTL_PAGE 0
65#define TAS2560_BOOKCTL_REG 0x7F
66
67#define TAS2560_REG(book, page, reg) (((book * 256 * 128) + (page * 128)) + reg)
68
69#define TAS2560_BOOK_ID(reg) (reg / (256 * 128))
70#define TAS2560_PAGE_ID(reg) ((reg % (256 * 128)) / 128)
71#define TAS2560_BOOK_REG(reg) (reg % (256 * 128))
72#define TAS2560_PAGE_REG(reg) ((reg % (256 * 128)) % 128)
73
74#define TAS2560_MUTE_REG TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 7)
75
76#define TAS2560_SR_CTRL1 TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 8)
77#define TAS2560_LOAD TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 9)
78#define TAS2560_SR_CTRL2 TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 13) /* B0_P0_R0x0d*/
79#define TAS2560_SR_CTRL3 TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 14) /* B0_P0_R0x0e*/
80
81#define TAS2560_DAI_FMT TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 20) /*B0_P0_R0x14*/
82#define TAS2560_CHANNEL TAS2560_REG(0, 0, 21) /*B0_P0_R0x15*/
83
84// Left justifying format, 16bit
85#define TAS2560_DAI_FMT_VALUE 0x6c
86#define TAS2560_DAI_WORD_LENGTH_MASK 0x03
87
88#define AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_I2C_WR 0x0000
89#define AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_I2C_RD (1u << 0)
90
91 // I2C message.
92 typedef struct i2c_msg
93 {
94 uint16_t addr; // Chip address.
95 uint16_t flags; // The flag of read or write.
96 uint16_t len; // The length of buffer.
97 uint8_t *buf; // The pointer of buffer.
98 } i2c_msg_t;
99
100 // The struct of register table.
101 typedef struct
102 {
103 uint8_t command; // Command or register address.
104 uint8_t param; // Command parameter, or register value.
105 } cfg_reg_t;
106
107 // Generic or interface specific status.
108 typedef enum
109 {
110 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_SUCCESS,
111 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_FAIL,
112 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_INVALID_HANDLE,
113 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_IN_USE,
114 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_TIMEOUT,
115 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_OUT_OF_RANGE,
116 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_INVALID_ARG,
117 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_INVALID_OPERATION,
118 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_MEM_ERR,
119 AM_DEVICES_TAS2560_STATUS_HW_ERR,
120 } am_devices_tas2560_status_t;
121
122 // TAS2560 channel mode
123 typedef enum
124 {
125 TAS2560_LEFT = 0, // Left channel
126 TAS2560_RIGHT, // Right channel
127 TAS2560_LEFT_RIGHT, // (Left + Right) / 2
128 TAS2560_MONO, // Mono mode
129 } am_devices_tas2560_ch_t;
130
131 // TAS2560 mute status
132 typedef enum
133 {
134 TAS2560_MUTE = 0, // Mute TAS2560
135 TAS2560_UNMUTE, // Unmute TAS2560
136 } am_devices_tas2560_mute_t;
137 //*****************************************************************************
138 //

140 //

142
143 //*****************************************************************************
144 //
151 //
152 //*****************************************************************************
153 extern uint32_t
154 am_devices_tas2560_i2c_init(uint32_t ui32Module,
155 am_hal_iom_config_t *psIOMSettings);
156
157 //*****************************************************************************
158 //
164 //
165 //*****************************************************************************
166 extern uint32_t am_devices_tas2560_init(uint8_t chip_addr);
167
168 //*****************************************************************************

175 //
176 //*****************************************************************************

178
179 //*****************************************************************************
180 //
186 //
187 //*****************************************************************************
188 extern uint32_t am_devices_tas2560_deinit(uint8_t chip_addr);
189
190 //*****************************************************************************
191 //
198 //
199 //*****************************************************************************
200 extern uint32_t am_devices_tas2560_set_sample_rate(uint8_t chip_addr,
201 uint32_t sample_rate);
202
203 //*****************************************************************************
204 //
211 //
212 //*****************************************************************************
213 extern uint32_t am_devices_tas2560_set_channel(uint8_t chip_addr,
214 am_devices_tas2560_ch_t ch);
215
216 //*****************************************************************************
217 //
224 //
225 //*****************************************************************************
226 extern uint32_t am_devices_tas2560_set_mute(uint8_t chip_addr,
227 am_devices_tas2560_mute_t val);
228#ifdef __cplusplus
229}
230#endif

232#endif
